abilities.name: Monochrome Blade
abilities.details: Arcian's basic attacks generates a stack of <span>Monochrome Blade[/], stacking up to three times.[n]The third stack empowers his basic attack to deal bonus [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/] and [ap]magical power[/]), and [db]steals[/] a small amount of the target's [mp]mana[/].

abilities.name: Phantom Slash
abilities.details: Arcian slashes twice at a target, each dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]). Each hit is counted as a basic attack.

abilities.name: Spectral Arsenal
abilities.details: Arcian periodically crafts a <span>Spectral Blade[/], up to a maximum of three can be stored at a time. Each <span>Spectral Blade[/] grants him bonus [bf]physical power[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]).[n]Arcian can cast this ability to manifest one <span>Spectral Blade[/] at the target location.

abilities.name: Void Steps
abilities.details: Arcian shifts to a manifested <span>Spectral Blade[/] on the ground, then empowers his next basic attack to blink to the enemy target, dealing bonus [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]).

abilities.name: Oblivion's Decree
abilities.details: Arcian enters a heightened state for several seconds, gaining bonus [ms]movement speed[/] and [as]attack speed[/].[n]During this state, Arcian replaces his <span>Monochrome Blade[/] with the <span>Oblivion Blade[/], making his third basic attack deals [td]true damage[/] instead of magical damage, and briefly [db]silences[/] the target instead of stealing mana.[n]The same enemy hero cannot be silenced twice during each <span>Oblivion's Decree[/], and will become vulnerable to mana steal again after the first silence.
